Description: Fragment of wall of Attic pottery cup. Outside glazed; inside glazed save for tondo, with reserved band at periphery and part of decoration inside; not enough preserved to judge whether black- or red-figured, though the latter is more likely. Incised inscription on inside.
Bibliographic references: Edgar 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis. B: The Inscribed and Painted Pottery (no. 102a)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 704, no. 625a)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1718)
